title: Meet MarkLogic
abstract:
Care & Feeding of Your MarkLogic Instance
Franklin Salonga, MarkLogic
 
MarkLogic lets you do amazing things with Big Data. Learn what you can do (and not do) to make sure your MarkLogic instance goes fast and is easy to manage. We're committed to customer success. We assure that success with both product improvements driven by customer feedback as well as partnership with our crack MarkLogic Support staff. Come see how we do it, and take home battle tested day-to-day best practices.
 
Ask the Chief Architect
Christopher Lindblad, MarkLogic
 
Join us as we geek-out with MarkLogic’s Founder and Chief Architect Dr. Christopher Lindblad. Christopher will take questions from the audience and share his views on where MarkLogic’s going. There’s no question too tough for Christopher! Last year this session was both fun and informative – don’t miss it!

surveys.comments: Too few talks like this. Need more about the internals of ML.
